name: Siebel: Business Component Field should have same type as related Table Column
associatedValueName: Types of the field and column
description: This rule reports BC Fields not having the same type as the related column.
output:
This rule reports Fields not having the same type as the related column.
It reports the following informations:
- Field full name
- Associated value is the types of the BC field and column
rationale:
It must use the same format/type that it uses in the Siebel database.
Siebel does not perform type conversion.
A different type would produce error at runtime.
remediation: Align the type of Business Component Field on the type of related Table Column
total: Number of added or modified Fields in Business Components
alternativeName: Siebel: Business Component Field should have same type as related Table Column
